section.title: Purpose
section.p: EqfSetSysLanguage sets the default target language for the system environment. All internal character conversions (Unicode to ASCII/ANSI, ASCII/ANSI to Unicode) and linguistic functions will use the provided default target language if no other language settings are available. This happens e.g. during Translation Memory import/export in ASCII. It is a good coding practice to retrieve the default target language first (EqfGetSysLanguage), set the requested default target language, do your processing and reset the default target language to the previously stored value. Using the EqfSetSysLanguage has the same effect as modifying the Default Target Language on the System Preferenece Dialog via the GUI.
